companies.name: Cijferbazen
companies.description:
CIJFERBAZEN is een samenwerking van zes onafhankelijke kantoren onder één merknaam.

Waarom we dit doen? Dat is eenvoudig: om een antwoord te bieden op de uitdagingen van morgen.

Het DNA van de groep houden we eenvoudig: samen sterk is het opzet, lokaal verankerd de stijl.

Een persoonlijk & lokaal aanspreekpunt voor jouw dossier, ondersteund door de voordelen van een grotere groep waarin kennisdelen en expertise centraal staan, zodat jij je maximaal kan focussen op je corebusiness, ondernemen!

Door onze samenwerking kan je terecht bij jouw aanspreekpunt voor alle facetten in je dossier van A-Z waarbij adviesverlening centraal staat, én dit alles gepresenteerd in de nieuwste softwarepakketten.

De eigenheid en naam van de verschillende kantoren blijft absoluut behouden.

derived_datapoints.pattern_tags: Accounting services, digital accounting, collaborative network
derived_datapoints.description: Cijferbazen is a collaborative network of independent accounting firms that have joined forces under a unified brand to offer a comprehensive suite of accounting, tax, and business advisory services. They provide a personal and locally-rooted service, supported by the expertise and resources of a larger group, enabling businesses to focus on their core operations. Cijferbazen leverages digital platforms and offers services ranging from bookkeeping and tax optimization to assistance with company formation.
derived_datapoints.scale_scope: regional; Location Detail: Multiple offices in Belgium

companies.name: BlueGround nv/sa
companies.description:
BlueGround, formerly known as Etugest Accountancy, is a trusted partner in Finance and Accountancy. Serving entrepreneurs and enterprises, we think with our clients to deliver beyond expectations. 

With five offices in and around Brussels, BlueGround offers SMEs support in accountancy, taxation and corporate law. BlueGround has 45 years of experience and understands the importance of accessibility for its clients. The name change to BlueGround is also associated with the company’s future strategic expansion towards services for businesses: the establishment of independent activities or companies; financial growth and investment; liquidations, divestments, mergers and acquisitions as well as shareholder support.

The new name BlueGround refers to the rock layer where diamonds are found. We’re still leaving diamond mining up to another sector - but the symbolism is clear. We dig ever deeper into our clients’ numbers in search of concrete optimisation possibilities. We are only satisfied when our advice helps our clients save and increase their profit margins.

With a 50 strong team, BlueGround is the solid accountancy foundation that companies can rely on, helping them focus purely on their core businesses. By being geographically accessible BlueGround, as a financial expertise centre with its varied specialist teams, can best follow clients and accompany them closely towards sustainable economic success.

companies.name: Centre d’Etudes de Droit Comptable et Fiscal (CEDCF)
companies.description:
Le CEDCF représente ses membres dans toutes les instances consultatives ou décisionnelles, belges ou internationales et à toutes manifestations scientifique. 

Le CEDCF organise chaque année depuis 1938, des séminaires et conférences de haut niveau qui visent de par le choix des sujets, des conférences et de la documentation remise aux participants, à développer des activités de formation permanente. 

Destinés aux stagiaires (IPCF, IEC, IRE), comptables, comptables-fiscalistes, experts-comptables, conseils fiscaux, réviseurs d’entreprises, avocats et toutes personnes soucieuses de parfaire leurs connaissances dans diverses matières comptables, fiscales, sociales, financières, juridiques et économiques de grand intérêt pratique. 

Pour ceux qui n’ont pas encore eu l’occasion d’assister à une de nos réunions, nos conférences sont toujours suivies d’une séance questions-réponses ainsi que d’un cocktail. 

Si vous souhaitez rester informés de nos activités et bénéficier de nos conditions privilégiées pour nos membres, nous vous suggérons de vous affilier.

derived_datapoints.description: The Centre d’Etudes de Droit Comptable et Fiscal (CEDCF) is a professional organization that represents its members in Belgian and international consultative and decision-making bodies. Established in 1938, CEDCF organizes high-level seminars and conferences to provide ongoing education in accounting, tax, social, financial, legal, and economic matters. These events are targeted towards trainees (IPCF, IEC, IRE), accountants, tax specialists, auditors, lawyers, and other professionals seeking to enhance their knowledge. CEDCF provides a platform for continuous learning and professional development in the field of accounting and fiscal law.
subindustry: Corporate Training and Learning and Development

companies.description: Groep Stimaa is een toonaangevende accountancy-kantorengroep met vestigingen in Vlaanderen en Brussel. We bieden uitgebreide fiscale diensten en op maat gemaakte oplossingen voor onze klanten. Onze expertise en toewijding stellen bedrijven in staat om succesvol te groeien en hun financiële doelen te bereiken.

derived_datapoints.description: Groep Stimaa is a leading group of accountancy firms with offices in Flanders and Brussels, Belgium. They provide comprehensive tax services and customized solutions, enabling companies to grow successfully and achieve their financial goals. companies.name: THG BRUXELLES SA
companies.description:
Toujours un pas en avant

Avec plus de 150 collaborateurs spécialisés et expérimentés thg accompagne depuis 25 ans plus de 2.500 mandataires dans de nombreux domaines groupés autour de la comptabilité, de la fiscalité et de la gestion d'entreprises.

thg offre le savoir-faire d’un grand groupe allié aux avantages d’un service individualisé fondé sur la pratique et la réalisation des objectifs fixés. Nous offrons à nos clients un service intégré et perspicace leur permettant de devancer les évènements. Pour ce faire, nous restons toujours attentifs au développement de nos métiers, des législations en vigueur ainsi que de l'évolution technologique.

Voilà ce qui nous distingue et nous qualifie comme partenaire de prédilection de votre entreprise.

La qualité de notre travail est votre sécurité.

derived_datapoints.description: THG Bruxelles SA is a Belgium-based firm offering accounting, tax, and business management services to over 2,500 clients. They emphasize individual service, expertise, and staying up-to-date with industry developments and technological advancements.

companies.name: DLV accountants
companies.description:
DLV accountants is een netwerk van accountantskantoren dat focust op de boekhoudkundige, fiscale en financiële begeleiding van de land- en tuinbouwondernemer. Naast de administratieve opvolging van de diverse fiscale en vennootschapsrechtelijke verplichtingen, wordt veel aandacht gegeven aan fiscale en bedrijfseconomische advisering. 

Al onze partners zijn erkend als accountant en belastingconsulent door het Instituut van accountants en belastingconsulenten. Ondertussen zijn er 10 partners van het DLV accountantsnetwerk met in totaal 20 vestigingen gespreid over heel Vlaanderen.

derived_datapoints.description: DLV Accountants is a network of accounting firms that focuses on providing accounting, tax, and financial guidance to agricultural and horticultural entrepreneurs in Flanders. They offer administrative support for various tax and corporate legal obligations and provide tax and business-economic advisory services. All partners are recognized as accountants and tax consultants by the Institute of Accountants and Tax Consultants. The DLV Accountants network has 10 partners with a total of 20 locations throughout Flanders. They work with DLV study and advisory bureau to provide total advice of agricultural projects.
derived_datapoints.scale_scope: regional; Location Detail: 20 locations across Flanders

companies.name: CROWE BELGIUM
companies.description:
Crowe Belgium provides a total solution for all your audit, accounting, tax, advisory, risk consulting and HR challenges. In Belgium Crowe Horwath is represented by two firms both driven by the same single focus to work out tailored made solutions to their client’s needs.
 
With the same idea, we work closely together in Belgium to support our international and local clients with new far reaching ideas and adequate service offerings.
 
We have a team of around 100 people, in all possible disciplines, covering all regions of Belgium, offering you an impeccable service and providing you the comfort you might expect, given the strong reputation we have built up over the years.
